mdRecord: 023985 Storer College Digital Collection West Virginia History OnView and Storer College Stone Tablet on John Brown's Fort on the Campus of Storer College, Harpers Ferry, W. Va. Maurice Joyce Engraving Company 'That this nation might have a new birth of freedom. That slavery should be removed forever from American soil. John Brown and his 21 men gave their lives. To commemorate their heroism, this tablet is placed on this building. Which has since been known as John Brown's Fort by the Alumni of Storer College 1918.'
